description: Required dependencies for Media Upload Module
instructions: Add these dependencies to your package.json file using npm install or yarn add

peerDependencies.description: These should already be present in your Next.js project

notes.sharp: Used for image processing and optimization. Platform-specific binary, may require rebuild on deployment.
notes.aws-sdk: Only required if using Cloudflare R2 or AWS S3 for cloud storage. Can be omitted if using local storage only.
notes.prisma: Database ORM for managing media items. You'll need to run 'prisma generate' after adding the schema.

optionalEnhancementDependencies.rateLimit: For API rate limiting - implement your own or use express-rate-limit equivalent
optionalEnhancementDependencies.validation: For advanced file validation - consider file-type or magic-bytes packages
optionalEnhancementDependencies.thumbnails: For advanced thumbnail generation - consider jimp or canvas alternatives
